actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to insure the equal protection of the laws and to protect the liberty of citizens as guaranteed by the 14th amendment, by eliminating Federal court jurisdiction over forced school attendance.

summary.text: States that no Federal court shall have jurisdiction to make any decision, or issue any order, which would have the effect of requiring any individual to attend any particular school.

titles.title: A bill to insure the equal protection of the laws and to protect the liberty of citizens as guaranteed by the 14th amendment, by eliminating Federal court jurisdiction over forced school attendance.
